import { NgFor } from "@angular/common"; import {Component} from "@angular/core"; import { Person } from "./person"; @Component({ selector: 'person-form', templateUrl: './person-form.component.html' }) export class PersonFormComponent { public Person: Person = new Person('', '', 0, '', new Date()); public professions = ['Developer', 'Architekt', 'Programista']; public btnClick() { alert(JSON.stringify(this.Person)); } }
